If there is conflict of interest of coz staff will be excluded. Which is why i stated before using own company product have no conflict of interest

This is a promotion and not base product. Promotion can exclude staff participation if they think there is potential conflict of interest. What is individual bank consideration is not known to us also. Just like mall employee cant paricipate in their own mall promotion also
This is salary credit promo and does not the DBS Multiplier account itself lol.

Not keen to argue further. But my point is rather than assume employees won‚Äôt be excluded  be it base product or promotions  it‚Äôs safest just to refer to the actual T&C.Will just leave it at that.

If u see most tnc  it is promotion campaign that usually exclude staff and not the usual base product. Some promotion even exclude family of staff as there could be conflict of interest. My key word is conflict of interest.
